title: Romania
creator_credit: Films Incorporated and Institut für Film und Bild
brief_description: Romania, for centuries an agricultural country whose people were mostly herdsmen, is now one of Eastern Europe’s most rapidly developing industrial nations. Surveys the country, its people geography and industry, and illustrates the changes taking place as the society progresses from rural to urban-industrial.
